attributes.action: have The Stig light the Olympic Flame in 2012
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon the government to have BBC show TopGear's The Stig light be the final bearer of the Olympic Torch and to light the flame for the 2012 Olympic Games.

rejection.details: Please contact LOCOG - the Olympics organising committee.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
